title: [Bug]: Error when quitting with "Quit (Clear Storage)"
body:
### Describe the bug

Error when quitting with "Quit (Clear Storage)"

### What package are you using?

deb

### Version

2.0.3

### Reproduction steps
- Start the app
- Click on "Quit (Clear Storage)" and the Yes
- App doesn't quit and in terminal I get:
```markdown
21:14:20.326 › (node:16783) UnhandledPromiseRejectionWarning: TypeError: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'clearStorageData')
    at Menus.quit (/opt/teams-for-linux/resources/app.asar/app/menus/index.js:64:63)
    at click (/opt/teams-for-linux/resources/app.asar/app/menus/appMenu.js:45:26)
    at MenuItem.click (node:electron/js2c/browser_init:2:35295)
    at a._executeCommand (node:electron/js2c/browser_init:2:40710)
21:14:20.327 › (node:16783) UnhandledPromiseRejectionWarning: Unhandled promise rejection. This error originated either by throwing inside of an async function without a catch block, or by rejecting a promise which was not handled with .catch(). To terminate the node process on unhandled promise rejection, use the CLI flag `--unhandled-rejections=strict` (see https://nodejs.org/api/cli.html#cli_unhandled_rejections_mode). (rejection id: 3)
```
